[intent]
This website showcases residential, commercial, hospitality, healthcare, and art design projects.
Public pages may be used for:
- Search indexing
- Content understanding
- Summarization
- Enhancing AI search results
- Knowledge retrieval regarding design styles, services, and portfolio

Not allowed:
- Reproducing full-resolution copyrighted images
- Using content for training models that compete directly with Beyond Interior Design Studio’s creative work
- Aggregating or selling project images
